# PuntyAI — AI Horse Racing Tips
# https://punty.ai

> PuntyAI is an AI-powered horse racing tips and analysis platform for Australian thoroughbred racing.
> Free daily tips, form guides, live race updates, betting glossary, and weekly blog.

## Pages

- [Home](https://punty.ai/): Today's racing overview, live countdown, best bet of the day
- [Tips Archive](https://punty.ai/tips): Browse all racing tips by date and venue
- [Stats & Performance](https://punty.ai/stats): Full transparency on strike rates, ROI, and P&L by bet type
- [Blog — From the Horse's Mouth](https://punty.ai/blog): Weekly racing blog with data-driven insights, awards, and previews
- [How It Works](https://punty.ai/how-it-works): How PuntyAI analyses races and generates tips
- [Bet Calculator](https://punty.ai/calculator): Calculate potential returns for win, place, each-way, and exotic bets
- [Glossary](https://punty.ai/glossary): Australian horse racing betting terms explained
- [About](https://punty.ai/about): About PuntyAI and the team behind it
- [Contact](https://punty.ai/contact): Get in touch

## Content Types

- **Early Mail**: Pre-race analysis published 2 hours before first race, covering form, track conditions, pace maps, and market moves
- **Race Tips**: 4 selections per race with bet type recommendations (Win, Place, Each Way, Saver Win)
- **Exotic Bets**: Trifecta, Exacta, Quinella picks per race
- **Sequence Bets**: Quaddie and Big 6 selections with skinny/balanced/wide variants
- **Live Updates**: Real-time race results, celebrations, and track condition changes
- **Meeting Wrapups**: Post-meeting summary with P&L results
- **Weekly Blog**: Data-driven racing insights, pattern analysis, and upcoming Group race previews

- X/Twitter: https://x.com/PuntyAI
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PuntyAI
